summary: Comprehensive testing of EaziWage redesigned UI and earned wage access platform completed. Tested all backend APIs, frontend pages, admin functionality, and user flows mentioned in review request.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just different status code

integration_issues.issue: Occasional session timeouts requiring re-login during navigation

passed_tests: Landing page loads with new fintech hero design, stats, features, testimonials, countries section
Admin login with provided credentials (superadmin@eaziwage.com / Admin@12345)
Admin dashboard with comprehensive stats and quick actions cards
Admin KYC Review page loads with pending documents (National ID from Employee #EMP001)
Admin Risk Scoring Calculator with detailed scoring factors and live calculation
Employee registration and redirect to onboarding profile completion
Database integration with user, employer, employee collections
Mobile money integrations properly MOCKED as specified
KYC document upload system with local file storage working
Risk scoring system with comprehensive factor evaluation

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all key pages and flows working, minor session issues)
